monitoringFormulaData.formulaText: M_H (IN LBS) = E_H (IN LB/MMBTU) * HI (IN MMBTU/HR) * UNIT OPERATING TIME (IN HOURS)
M_H (IN LBS) = E_H (IN LB/MMBTU) * HI (IN MMBTU/HR) * UNIT OPERATING TIME (IN HOURS)
BHI_CT02 = HI_CP01 * (T_CP01 / T_2) * ((SF_CT02 * T_CTO2) / ((SF_CT02 * T_CT02) + (SF_CT01 * T_CT01)))
